Olathe.Olathe Northwest High School: Olathe Northwest High School is a fully accredited public high school located in Olathe, Kansas, United States, serving students in grades 9–12. The school is one of five high schools in the Olathe School District and also one of the twelve in the Sunflower League. The school colors are blue, black, and white, and the school mascot is the Raven.
